hackathon-description-text: HealthHackSTL 2018 is a health-focused hackathon for students and industry professionals of all backgrounds with a passion for tech, design, and innovation.
hackathon-eligibility: *Individuals between 13 and 17 years of age must sign a parental consent waiver to participate.
hackathon-requirements: Final project must be submitted via DevPost by 10am CST on Sunday, April 8, 2018.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $5,000 in cash for the entire team.
$3,500 in cash for the entire team.
$1,500 in cash for the entire team.
SteelSeries Arctis Bluetooth All-Platform Gaming Headsets (1 per team member)
Polaroid Cube+ 1440p Mini Lifestyle Action Cameras
Sphero Battle-Worn Bb-8 Droid with Force Band
